response.overview: 13 years ago, deep in the woods of Camp Honey Badger, a troubled young camper named Fletcher Remi disappeared in a bizarre fire, leaving nothing but questions and ashes behind Three days later, 6 counselors disappeared with little trace. The unsolved case turned cold, but locals tell stories of a Masked Butterfinger Butcher lurking in the woods with an evil fire burning in his dark eyes. Now, 6 new counselors have come to reopen the camp. One by one they will find out the hard way - that dark legends don't die, and no one can you scream when your mouth's full.
response.tagline: You Can't Scream With Your Mouth Full!
response.title: Butterfinger the 13th
